web_snippets: Donna Dillard. “I have known and worked with Derek Kernus for four and half years. He is a cyber security professional with outstanding customer service ...
Meet Derek Kernus, CEO of Aethon Security. With CISSP, CCSP, and CMMC ... Aethon Security is a CMMC Level 2 Certified External Service Provider.
Host Shelley McGuire sits down with Derek Kernus, CEO of Aethon Security, to dive into the complexities of cybersecurity compliance.
